storyInfo: Malkiewicz privately reports Ingra, but is also caught tangled as a result, and soon after, he meets the Doctor of Rhodes Island. The General Chamber of Commerce hopes for the Candle Knight to cooperate in ensnaring Margaret, but the Candle Knight herself seems against the idea.

attributes.content: I've been hearing you reported Olmer Ingra to the National Council?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: True...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If a fatality during the Major isn't enough to warrant punishment, then what does the law even...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: We're all well aware of how the National Council operates, Malkiewicz, my man. You had to deal plenty enough with them in your entrepreneurial life, didn't you?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Don't spend too long at a loss. You have a trip to the Infected intake-treatment zone in a short while. You need to make the Knights Association and a few healthcare firms see eye to eye.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Think on the bright side. This work is saving lives in and of itself, isn't it?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Don't get too worn out. You'll grind yourself to dust at this rate. If you'll excuse me, I'm off to a meeting.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Hello, Malkiewicz speaking...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Spokesman Malkiewicz, hope you're having a good day.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I'm a deputy justice of the National Council. Your suit has reached us, Spokesman.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: How do you plan to proceed?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It is the obligation of a spokesperson to report those knights out of line with the regulations of the General Chamber. As such, we will prioritize our considerations your... complaints against Brassrust Knight.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: However, matters with said Knight Olmer Ingra are somewhat complex.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: You should be aware it was not long ago that Ingra's application for bail was given fresh approval by the National Council; to try him again now could have adverse implications for the National Council's authority.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: We consider, of course... that the spokesperson's demand equates to the Board of Directors' demand. Such as is the only interpretation we can make, we would not refuse you.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Which is why we're having this call. I understand. What are the National Council's conditions?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh... conditions? Please, not in those terms. I hope you understand this to be a perfunctory business call.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Mr. Czarny suffered banishment external to proceedings; that was beyond many expectations. Even we do not consider Mr. Czarny's mistake to be so irredeemable.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: But regardless, the past is the past. Czarny has left the Grand Knight Territory and been deprived of his place as a spokesman.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: But because of the abruptness of this banishment, we have not been able to appropriately—handle the aftermath, with regards to all parties.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: The Rose Paper Union is a patron of Brassrust. That is Mr. Czarny's personal handiwork.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: He is privy to too much... Mr. Malkiewicz, do you understand?
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.text: I hear my own heart thumping.

attributes.content: I... don't understand...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If you can ensure Mr. Czarny never again will be an issue for us... then we will be sure to punish Brassrust with the full force of the law.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.text: I've never imagined something like this would be happening to me.
No, actually, I have. I just never thought it would be my decision.

attributes.content: So... you mean... I should...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I understand the Major has your hands full. It need not be straight away. You need only agree that you will have Mr. Czarny disappear in a respectable manner, and I will leave at once to make the arrangements.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Of course, in the wake of Mr. Czarny's disappearance, we may also come to establish... a deep bond of reliance.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I'm afraid I can't give you an answer right now.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: That is very regrettable. We hope you will make your mind up as soon as possible; Sir Brassrust Knight's suspension is by no standards a long one.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: We welcome your call any time, Mr. Malkiewicz. May you have a wonderful day.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Mr. Malkiewicz? Are you there?
attributes.name: A Person at the Door

attributes.content: C-Come in...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Uh... Mr. Malkiewicz... I'm sorry to disturb you.
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: To tell the truth, uh, I haven't been sleeping well lately. I got the notice I'd be MCing a whole bunch of the Major's events, and I'm honored... but...
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Can I ask if I've been getting any complaints recently? I heard some people aren't happy with how I perform now, saying they liked the old style better.
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I think we'll be hard-pressed to get a direct answer from the Board. Sorry, Mob. Just proceed with caution.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: *Sigh*... There's a huge bonus on the line once I'm done commentating for the Major, right?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: So long as you don't slip up.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Say... what kind of place is your hometown? The...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The City of Artisans?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ha, who's asking these days. It's a little old place... used to be pretty famous, but now it's just a tired, backwards city.
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That's why I came to the Grand Knight Territory. Needed another way to make my life happen. You get me, right?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I'll help you as much as I can to get your word out, Mr. Mob. You've worked very hard...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...They won't trouble you... they wouldn't.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: What are you looking at?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Infected management procedures.;A statement from the K.G.C.C.;Gossip about the Major.

attributes.content: Ah... the Infected shelter and treatment. It's an initiative they only started in the last few years. It's got a long way to go.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But even for you, Doctor, I say you're better off not prying too deeply~
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Infected knights have been a thorn in the side of all the great nobles. If Rhodes Island wants a premier business contract, then it's important to know when to bite your tongue.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The K.G.C.C... Their pamphlets really do dampen your day.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If you're finding it dull, Doctor, I could accompany you on a strollabout. So long as I'm with you, even a little trip to the commercial districts won't fall out of line.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Of course... if you're more inclined to stay in here, I won't meddle.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: The Major... ahh.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Come to think of it, the Rhodes Islanders all seem tied up with the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Are you worried about her? Heh-heh... I'm jealous...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Competition knights are always in the public eye, but you... care for her as a 'companion,' don't you?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: It's a novel feeling, the Radiant Knight somewhere other than Kazimierz—how is a knight regarded, I wonder, in the world beyond her country?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: By the way, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You have a meeting in a bit, with a spokesman from the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Spokespeople for the K.G.C.C. are the cream of the crop from all walks of life, chosen by the board, each with their own duty, handling all sorts of affairs large and small for the Major.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: They're not the highest tier of authority, but they're channels to it. Seeing how a Chamber mouthpiece has asked to meet you by name, I'd like you to be a little careful.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Come what may, I will be responsible for your safety throughout your stay in Kazimierz. I'll be as close as your shadow.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Uh oh, what's that look on your face for now? Do you still not trust me? I can't help but feel a little hurt...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But relax. So long as I'm by your side... you'll be perfectly safe.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If you have doubts about my loyalty... if I do anything that worries you, then Rhodes Island can punish me however you want...
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ...any way you want.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Excuse me... is this the room where {@nickname} from Rhodes Island is staying?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Ah, Madam Knight... who might you be?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Fourth-order knight 'Gravel,' serving as a security consultant for the Doctor and other Rhodes Islanders, for as long as they stay in Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I've been appointed by the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi, Mr. Spokesman. Please don't mind me, and continue with your work.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Take a seat, {@nickname}, and as for you, er... Miss Gravel, if your post allows for it, by all means relax as well.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'd rather stand and keep a nice, firm grip on the situation.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're here representing Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: Yes, nice to meet you.;......;Would it shock you if I said no?

attributes.content: Nice to meet you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Er... haha, I guess you're not exactly the sociable type. But that won't at all spoil my... respect for you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Erm? Maybe... I just heard the company's representative was staying nearby.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: You're joking, right? You must be {@nickname}... haha, you've got a sense of humor.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm Spokesman Malkiewicz of the General Chamber of Commerce... Just Malkiewicz is fine.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I've been over my information about Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals. I don't have any relevant background in it, but keeping up the fight against Oripathy... it can't be easy.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: We're very much thankful for the contributions you're making to the Kazimierz Major Project. Have you looked over the terms yet?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will be acting as a collaborating firm, standing as a unit of the 'medical group,' forming the 'Kazimierz Alliance Medical Organization for the Treatment of Infected.'
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The Organization is under direct purview of the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi... of course, the Knights Association and our own people will make every effort to cooperate with your work as well.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: The Adeptus... the Knights Association, and 'you.'

attributes.content: That's right... In the Grand Knight Territory, you can't avoid dealing with multiple fronts of power. I believe you'll get used to it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If you have any questions at all, please feel free to speak up. It's my duty to give answers to our foreign guests, Doctor.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: But I've heard it's the 'K.G.C.C.' we should watch out for.;Are there other Infected here besides the knights?;What do you think? About our... firm.

attributes.content: Ah... you seem to have misunderstood. My position is 'spokesman,' but summarily, I represent the 'General Chamber of Commerce' itself.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The General Chamber is the organizer of the Kazimierz Major, as well as an indispensable trade group to Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Actually, though the medical group is nominally the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's purview, all funding and movement of supplies is within the Chamber's control.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Therefore, we must value the K.G.C.C.'s intents.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Er... perhaps... I'm not sure.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But this project is solely aimed to serve Infected knights lawfully registered with the Knights Association, knight trainees, and candidates.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If we had... for example, an unlucky civilian infected in a workplace injury...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Though they wouldn't be covered by the remit, if they could afford it, they would also be eligible to apply for treatment and shelter.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: ...If they could afford it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Me? Haha... you're asking me?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If I'm completely honest, Infected are far from a part of my life... ah, don't misunderstand me...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: All I mean is that fighting to keep a hold of yourself in a hectic city, scrambling about to live and work... that's an everyday state of affairs for the vast majority.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I know little to nothing about the other countries across our world, but... protecting a group of sick discriminated against for their illness—that can't be a bad thing, can it?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: But are all Kazimierzians really willing to lend a hand to the Infected?

attributes.content: By all rights, I shouldn't be discussing this with you, but... ahem.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: The Infected knight system was structured by the Adeptus and the K.G.C.C.'s Managing Director in concert, fresh in the wake of the Blood Knight's win.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh, of course, its premise and scope revolves around 'competition knights.' The lady over there isn't accounted for; the army has their own regulations for handling Infected.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Infected have a special format to go through—it's an additional step we usually call the 'Wipe Out Qualifier,' to prove their ability to, well, be knights.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If there do happen to be promising athletes among the Infected, then the General Chamber of Commerce doesn't mind cleaning up their identities for them.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Have... have you seen the papers recently? Even now, quite a few are still opposed to this whole thing.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But at least the Infected don't need to die in misery. In my mind, that's already a big improvement.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Regarding all of you at Rhodes Island... the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi considers you to be an agency with ample experience in dealing with the Infected.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: This is why we'd like you to take charge of physical examinations on the 'Infected knights,' and formulate treatment plans over the Major.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Treatment plans, huh?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Can you give me an idea of the scale of the issue?

attributes.content: Scale? The Infected knights total less than 7% of all competing. Though that's only the count of Infected knights legally registered with the Knights Association.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: If you count everyone, the knight candidates, trainees, and the Infected who were forced to give their nobility under a different identity...
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It's a number worth worrying about. And that's another reason why we're here, discussing this.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: It seems there's been bad rumors around lately.

attributes.content: You can guess how many Kazimierzians are prejudiced against the Infected.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'll be open with you; the original intent of the Alliance Medical Organization was to appease the populace, by way of systematically treating and administering the Infected knights.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: My wording might've struck you as distasteful, but they're ill after all... and we can't ignore that objective, er, discrepancy. Sorry to put it that way.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Of course, if there's anything at all we can help with, you need only ask.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: At the least... I hope every good knight—can go out with a happy ending.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: Can you tell me about what goes on with the K.G.C.C.?

attributes.content: Er, sorry, I have some business to attend to. If I get the chance, I'd be happy to have dinner with you.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: But, er, what part of it did you want to know about?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.options: It's a business entity representing a country. I have lots of questions.

attributes.content: Sorry I'm late.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What happened? What was all the talk of you getting carried off by the Candle Knight?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What did that woman tell you? Did she threaten you? Was the General Chamber of Commerce—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Calm down, Zofia.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We were just dodging reporters, that's all.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The Candle Knight Droste, eh? Always been an enigma, she has...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: But she's probably in the top three knights of Kazimierz, based on popularity alone. The turnover on her birthday each year'd be enough to build a whole fort.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: What sort of knight is she?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Why are you so like Maria? Listen, you need to pay a little more attention to the rivals around you.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You're here for me, aren't you?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Sweet-talking me won't get you anywhere.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: She's an astronomical rising star. People even call her 'the second Black Knight.'
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: She comes from Leithanien, and has a terrifying talent for Arts, an aristocratic upbringing, fine looks, and meteoric fame for her accomplishments.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: With all that plus her opaque background adding to the scent of mystery around her, practically overnight, the Candle Knight became one of Kazimierz's household names and a Grand Knight.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The media is still digging into how she leads her private life...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: But she's by no means just for show.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: She's very young, and very fierce.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I met plenty of supremely talented Casters during my roaming days. Victorians, Leithanians, and... Infected.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Even the most outstanding Caster in the world would find it hard to challenge the qualities she exudes. She may not be a soldier, but I won't underestimate her.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Black Knight's a very unusual case of Leithanian. She was no good at even the slightest bit of Arts. It's as though she was born to be martial.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: That age has come and gone, but I don't think anyone could forget the sheer impression she left, brandishing her massive armaments about.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: And the Candle Knight, on the flip end of the spectrum, she's practically a 'model' Leithanian knight.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: We don't know what the core of her Arts is, exactly, but the word 'Candle' is absolutely reflective of her equipment's form and her fighting style.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Margaret... is she your next opponent?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: In two days. It'll be a bitter fight, and we don't have long to prepare... Where's Maria?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: She's at home resting... Are...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Are you smiling?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Hm? Am I?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...I predicted you would refuse, Miss Droste.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But the General Chamber wants no more of the Radiant Knight winning left and right like this. We must ensure, at least, that she falls to the loser's bracket.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Strange... Wouldn't it have been easier if you didn't give amnesty to the Radiant Knight to begin with?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Well... That's...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: 'The General Chamber of Commerce is never fastened as one.'
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Please! You... must not say anything of the sort, not where you might be heard.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Board of Directors is sure to have internal disputes, there's no doubt of that, but if a knight like you were to express such opinions, I worry it'd impact your status.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: My apologies... you must have it just as hard, McKee.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Ah... yes, thank you for your concern...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: In short, I'll be working to mediate for you, even if you aren't willing to use any 'special tricks' against the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But I'd like for you to understand: though you've refused the Board of Directors's proposal, they will adopt other methods. The situation may, perhaps, evolve towards some extreme...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Armorless Union, you mean.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: If possible, I'd like for you to prevent such circumstances from taking hold.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Miss Droste... *sigh* That's far beyond me to promise.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Heh... come to speak of it, is the Board of Directors so untrusting in my power? As a knight, that really does give me mixed feelings.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: No, that's absolutely not the case, I assure you.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Grand Knights at the forefront of the Major all, without a doubt, have the power to rival the apex knights of any country.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: But opposingly, once you step into this domain, once you near the so-called 'limit,' the gaps shrink in size.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The uncertain elements will only grow... isn't that so?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I have no intent of putting you in a predicament. I know how the Board of Directors thinks.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: You can go now. I'll look into this... Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Good. I'll leave the competition tapes and personal files you need here, then.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight seems to have changed vastly since her banishment, I need to warn you of that.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Yes... hence why I wanted to meet her.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Margaret Nearl... Margaret Nearl... hm.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Despises the knight tournament industry, granddaughter of a war hero. The Nearl family's pegasus, yet a high-profile champion of the Major too...
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Said to be noble, yet she gives off the air of a campaign knight. Has she seen war and death for herself...?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: No, she must have.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Then has she transcended death before? Has she truly dreamed of casting off the fetters and chains?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Or has she already stridden over a whole new boundary?
attributes.name: The Candle Knight

attributes.content: Heheh, Margaret. How much she seems like... a true knight.
attributes.name: The Candle Knight
